page.title: 10KINGSMEAD COMPREHENSIVE
page.content: The Headmaster feels the school is attractive due to it s small size (550),caring staff and good careers record. As 3/4 of the pupils travel by bus after school activities are difficult to arrange.This is a pity as many of these rural children have few opportunities for entertainment.A 14 year girl said "Country children are deprived.They have to be ferried from place to place so they can enjoy themselves.Also there are usually no kids of your own age.I have to hang around with kids older or younger.When parties and discos are on I can't go because my dad doesn't want to collect me so I stay at home,do nothing and get thoroughly bored.I really hate living in a village .Its just so boring that I watch TV,eat and sleep." Do boys have a better time?
